entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 12:07 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
